languages.text: "Помышление дерзновенное и благое — отворение врат новых для вод Познания, Постижения. Начертанный план, коим идут праведные..."
"An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."
languages.original_text: "Помышление дерзновенное и благое — отворение врат новых для вод Познания, Постижения. Начертанный план, коим идут праведные..."

traits.locale_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."
"An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

"An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

languages.text: "Das ist gleichermaßen mutig wie ehrenhaft ... neue Tore für die Wasser des Wissens und Begreifens zu öffnen. Ein Plan, der so verfasst ist, dass ihm die Rechtschaffenen folgen können ..."
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist gleichermaßen mutig wie ehrenhaft ... neue Tore für die Wasser des Wissens und Begreifens zu öffnen. Ein Plan, der so verfasst ist, dass ihm die Rechtschaffenen folgen können ..."

languages.text: « D'une intention à la fois audacieuse et honorable : ouvrir de nouvelles portes aux eaux de la Connaissance et de la Compréhension. C'est un plan écrit pour que les justes le suivent... »
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: « D'une intention à la fois audacieuse et honorable : ouvrir de nouvelles portes aux eaux de la Connaissance et de la Compréhension. C'est un plan écrit pour que les justes le suivent... »

languages.text: “某个光荣而大胆的构想，为知识与理解的源泉打开新的大门，为虔诚之人准备的计划……”
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: “某个光荣而大胆的构想，为知识与理解的源泉打开新的大门，为虔诚之人准备的计划……”

languages.text: 「知識と理解への新たな門を開くための、大胆かつ高潔な意図。正義が導かれるように描かれた計画…」
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: 「知識と理解への新たな門を開くための、大胆かつ高潔な意図。正義が導かれるように描かれた計画…」

languages.text: «Una intención tan audaz como honorable: abrir nuevas vías hacia el Conocimiento y la Comprensión. Un plan escrito para que lo sigan los justos...».
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: «Una intención tan audaz como honorable: abrir nuevas vías hacia el Conocimiento y la Comprensión. Un plan escrito para que lo sigan los justos...».

languages.text: "Cüretkâr olduğu kadar asil de bir niyet: İrfanın ve İdrakin sularına yeni kapaklar açmak. Erdemlilerin aydınlanmanın yüce örüntüsüne..."
languages.original_text: "An intention both bold and honourable — to open new gates for the waters of Knowledge and Comprehension. A plan written so that the righteous may follow..."

traits.locale_text: "Cüretkâr olduğu kadar soylu bir niyet: İrfan ve İdrak'in kapılarını ardına kadar açmak. Bu plan, yalnızca erdemlilerin uyması ve..."
